title: SBA Communications outlines $1.5B share repurchase plan and raises 2025 financial outlook
excerpt: Get key insights from SBA Communications' Q1 2025 earnings, including record leasing activity, strong financial outlooks, and a $1.5B share repurchase plan.
text: Earnings Call Insights: SBA Communications Corporation (SBAC) Q1 2025 Management View CEO Brendan Cavanagh highlighted that Q1 2025 started strong, with results aligning with expectations and domestic leasing business achieving its best quarter in several years. Earnings Call Insights: SBA Communications Corporation (SBAC) Q1 2025

Management View

  • CEO Brendan Cavanagh highlighted that Q1 2025 started strong, with results aligning with expectations and domestic leasing business achieving its best quarter in several years. The leasing backlog grew, indicating sustained demand, particularly
